content.text: You're in luck. It's easier than ever to order from anywhere you are, just... _not_ on your PD! Head to our website and you can browse the complete shop, see full-color photos, and get shipping right to your door.
As a _Thank You!_ for visiting our Constellations site here on PlayDate, please enjoy an extra 10% off your order. Just use the *Coupon Code* below when you checkout. Hope you love it!
Sign up for our email newsletter and get 10% off your order!
Free shipping on U.S. orders over $75.
_Find us on the World Wide Web!_
